description:
Lilly was a young dreamy girl working in a fashion boutique. She always dreamed of becoming a successful fashion designer in the fashion capital of the world: Paris.

One night something strange happened. A beautiful fairy in a fancy dress appeared. She promised to help Lilly to make her dream come true. All Lilly had to do was traveling to Paris within 45 days and collect peopleâ€™s inspirations.

You can help Lilly to get the inspiration a fashion designer needs. Play this game in 45 levels of pure fashion!
name: Fashion Tycoon
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
